alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 1:54PM CDT until May 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette to Riverton. White River at Elliston and Edwardsport. .Recent rainfall will lead to minor flooding along the Wabash and Lower White Rivers in Indiana. Additional rainfall is expected over the next several days, bringing additional flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY, MAY 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday, May 15. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Thursday /2:00 PM EDT Thursday/ the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning to a crest of 18.4 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late next week. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
